description.db:para: This table for the registrar module is similar to the "location" table, (the aliases index makes lookup of missed calls much faster). Thus, the function lookup("alias") can be used to map aliases to AORs. More information is available at: &KAMAILIO_MOD_DOC;registrar.html. Most people uses the dbaliases table with the alias_db module now.

column.name: id
column.description: unique ID

column.name: ruid
column.description: Record internal unique id

column.name: &USERCOL;
column.description: Username / phone number

column.name: domain
column.description: Domain name

column.name: contact
column.description: Contact header field value provides a URI whoses meaning depends on the type of request or response it is in.

column.name: received
column.description: Received IP:PORT in the format SIP:IP:PORT

column.name: path
column.description: Path Header(s) per RFC 3327

column.name: expires
column.description: Date and time when this entry expires.

column.name: q
column.description: Value used for preferential routing.

column.name: callid
column.description: Call-ID header field uniquely identifies a particular invitation or all registrations of a particular client.

column.name: cseq
column.description: CSeq header field contains a single decimal sequence number and the request method.

column.name: last_modified
column.description: Date and time when this entry was last modified.

column.name: flags
column.description: Internal flags

column.name: cflags
column.description: Branch and contact flags

column.name: user_agent
column.description: User-Agent header field contains information about the UAC originating the request.

column.name: socket
column.description: Socket used to connect to Kamailio. For example: UDP:IP:PORT

column.name: methods
column.description: Flags that indicate the SIP Methods this contact will accept.

column.name: instance
column.description: The value of SIP instance parameter for GRUU.

column.name: reg_id
column.description: The value of reg-id contact parameter

column.name: server_id
column.description: The value of server_id from configuration file

column.name: connection_id
column.description: The value of connection id for location record

column.name: keepalive
column.description: The value to control sending keep alive requests

column.name: partition
column.description: The value to of the partition for keep alive requests
